148b3(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs

149a3(mdo sde): phyin/ khyod kyi yon tan bsngags 'phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tar gter// der ni chos ston gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchis//
149a4(mdo sde): chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du// bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang // shin tu bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal// sems can rnam
149a5(mdo sde): par dgrol slad tha dad bstan par mdzad/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar phyogs

149b2(mdo sde): khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
149b3(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las byed cing / gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan thugs rje'i
149b4(mdo sde): sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas/ / 'od kyi glog phyung stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te// yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing // dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal
149b5(mdo sde): gel ba 'phel bar mdzad/ / bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal nas// ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sang mdzad de// lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang
149b6(mdo sde): bskams par mdzad/ / thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan
149b7(mdo sde): 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
150a1(mdo sde): pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul
150a2(mdo sde): ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig zang cig yud tsam de
150a3(mdo sde): la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
150a4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi 'phreng ba'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
150a5(mdo sde): bkab ste/ tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sku yi 'phrin las nam mkha'i khams 'dra zhing // smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mar
150a6(mdo sde): ldan/ dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// khyod kyi chog ni rgyan chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste// 'gro
150a7(mdo sde): ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshim bgyid/ / sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang // sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung // de nas byang chub
150b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis
150b2(mdo sde): sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ / de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis
150b3(mdo sde): spras pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhar cig tu
150b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing re nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
150b5(mdo sde): sngar 'dug nas/ de sa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing / ror
150b6(mdo sde): bu'i do shal dang / rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// 'dzam bu chu gser btso ma lta
150b7(mdo sde): bur ser ba'i sku/ / kun nas spyan mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes// mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges rtogs pa// de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/
151a1(mdo sde): gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa'i lta bu'i khrun tsam du// 'jig rten mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni// de yis rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus
151a2(mdo sde): kyis/ rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

151a4(mdo sde): pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa nA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'

151b1(mdo sde): par bstod do/ / spu yis mtha' dpung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang // sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod pas// mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'
151b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal/ / zhing gcig phyogasal zhing mang rab 'byam ston mdzad de// kun tu bstan kyang rnam par 'phel dang 'grib ma mchis// bsam pa chen
151b3(mdo sde): po dang ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/ / dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa de dag gis bcom ldan

152a2(mdo sde): na bza'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/
152a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra ba srung // tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin tu thugs rje zhing // bdag la stod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad// lhun po ji bzhin khyod
152a4(mdo sde): bstan bla ma rgya chen ston/ / chu gter zab mo bzhin du shir tu gting dpag dka'// srid pa dog par bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste// sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol/
152a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi

152b4(mdo sde): bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ / byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po med par ston// sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang // 'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis mkhas ma mchis/
152b5(mdo sde): dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na// gzugs mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags// 'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs// chos rnams snang
152b6(mdo sde): yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang

153a1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa rnam par sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'

153a5(mdo sde): rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bka ba ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// zab mo'i chos la mkhas
153a6(mdo sde): shing rab tu zhi la mos/ / khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen// khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal// mtha' yas blo mnga' sems kyis bsam pa cho ga
153a7(mdo sde): mkhyen/ / sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod// gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen// sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyis 'du shes min//

153b7(mdo sde): mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji skad rdul mchis pa// de snyed bde gshegs sras po
154a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i drung lhags te/ / bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus pa dag/ de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad// blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab
154a2(mdo sde): shin tu rdzogs/ / gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te// bskal pa mang po mtha' yas bsngags pa rab brjod kyang // skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so//

154b3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin/ / mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dpung med pa ji bzhin du// byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin 'od de mya ngan 'das// sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung
154b4(mdo sde): bapa ltar/ / de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
154b5(mdo sde): bapar bstod nas/ steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do// de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa

155a1(mdo sde): bsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pas
155a2(mdo sde): dang zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de gang gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung bstar ba'i sgra de
155a3(mdo sde): thos nas/ lus dang sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par byin te

155a7(mdo sde): gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par phyin te/

155b2(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub
155b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
155b4(mdo sde): mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i me tog dpal gyi snying pos chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems
155b5(mdo sde): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa'i dbus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing
155b6(mdo sde): ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya cu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sil ma sna
155b7(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ 'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/
156a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos
156a2(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khro chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba mngon par sprul nas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting
156a3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin de las langs te/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab
156a4(mdo sde): tu bgyid/ / lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum cu rtsa gsum dga'// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes// sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul
156a5(mdo sde): pa 'di/ / chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin lam badz+ra// smram smig rgya lta bu chu li za 'dra zhing // rje med byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par// mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam
156a6(mdo sde): par bsgrub pa ston/ / bkod pa sems kyi dbang 'gro rnams ni gzugs can min// rnam bsgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro// bkod pa thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang
156a7(mdo sde): bzhin 'dra/ / rnam bsgrub bdag gi ma mchis gang na'ang gnas ma mchis// gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba// de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so//
156b1(mdo sde): rtog dang kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba// de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston// sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang // sa steng nor bu rin chen
156b2(mdo sde): sna tshogs kun tu ston/ / gdan gang bzhugs nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba// khyod kyis seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog
156b3(mdo sde): dang dar gyi 'phreng ba bsgreng / / de ni gang du'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis// khyod kyis gang nas chos rnams 'dul ba mkhyen nas kyang // sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna
156b4(mdo sde): tshogs ston/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs ltar legs shing shin tu bsrung ba'i gsung // 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang // bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs
156b5(mdo sde): gdan la bzhugs/ / rga dang 'chi dang nu ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol// khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan rmad du// rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcur gnas
156b6(mdo sde): lhags/ / gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol// seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog
156b7(mdo sde): dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bsnyes
157a1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang /
157a2(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor
157a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la bab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo
157a4(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos ston pa/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi
157a5(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa snying po dang ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos
157a6(mdo sde): kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thug pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas
157a7(mdo sde): pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin
157b1(mdo sde): du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir rten cing 'dre
157b2(mdo sde): par 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs
157b3(mdo sde): pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
157b4(mdo sde): theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems rab tu dben par shes/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa
157b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bsnyad pa
157b6(mdo sde): dang / bshad pa dang / bklag pa dang / gsung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin
157b7(mdo sde): gshes pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tshom thams cad gcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
158a1(mdo sde): bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so//
158a2(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
158a3(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags stobs
158a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyal pos pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lda ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon bu rnams byin
158a5(mdo sde): gyis brlabs te/ me tog gi lda ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro// de nas sangs rgyas
158a6(mdo sde): kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi sku'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi
158a7(mdo sde): snying po drir byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyi 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang
158b1(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
158b2(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus
158b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' bar bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga'
158b4(mdo sde): ba dang / mos par byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
158b5(mdo sde): zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i
158b6(mdo sde): rgyal pos brjed pa med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi
158b7(mdo sde): brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad
159a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jom pas bdud kyi
159a2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'jom pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin
159a3(mdo sde): de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang /
159a4(mdo sde): bcas te/ myur ba myur bar rings su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ de dag gis
159a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnams brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par thal
159a6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa chos
159a7(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur
159b1(mdo sde): ba'i las mi bgyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du mchis te/ bdag cag chos mnyan par bgyid do// de nas bcom
159b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbug dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka stsal to/ / grogs po dag legs so legs so// gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la/ de bzhin gshes
159b3(mdo sde): pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob cig dang / de nyid khyed kyis bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
159b4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ / grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i
159b5(mdo sde): mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi
159b6(mdo sde): ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to// grogs po de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun
159b7(mdo sde): pa mun nag thams cad sel to/ / grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba ri rtsa ba 'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas/ chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
160a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
160a2(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa drang kun tu bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas/
160a3(mdo sde): nges par 'byung ba'i sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed par the tshom ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub
160a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rnams kyi 'dus pa 'drini ci te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa
160a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcur sgra baspags pa/ sems shin tu byung bar bgyis te/ dri ma ma mchis pa rig pa dang / rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing
160a6(mdo sde): bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang drug gis dbang gyur ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son / thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par byas pa/ 'dud kyi
160a7(mdo sde): 'apo dang / cod pa dang / nyon mongs pa mas cad pasal ni bas kyi rgol pa dang / ngan pa'i chogs can gyi chogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba/ tsam thams cad rab tu dbye ba brgyan pa
160b1(mdo sde): shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang
160b2(mdo sde): gzungs dang / ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byin gyi rlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa shes pa la
160b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang skad
160b4(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang / bya ka la bing+ga dang / khrung khrung kI s+thA dang / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs can shin tu bshes gnyen bgyis pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su
160b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pal 'god pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can brtan zhing shin tu gnas la/ mi g.yo zhing ji skang smra ba de bzhin du bgyid pa/
160b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan yang dag par sgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi chags pa'i khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo blta dka' zhing
160b7(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang rtag par mtha' gnyis ka dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa/ tshogs can
161a1(mdo sde): chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gug pa/ ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gi bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal
161a2(mdo sde): po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spre'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad
161a3(mdo sde): dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa thams cad la sems dpa' ba bdud
161a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang nyon mongs pa'i yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
161a5(mdo sde): la snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang /
161a6(mdo sde): grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs
161a7(mdo sde): pa chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad+ma lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
161b1(mdo sde): par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ chos dkon mchog thams cad
161b2(mdo sde): la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i go cha 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
161b3(mdo sde): dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa/ bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
161b4(mdo sde): ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par bslag pa mthar mi phyin phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di
161b5(mdo sde): snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/ /
161b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dog par gyur pa/ sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag
161b7(mdo sde): par bskyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi
162a1(mdo sde): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba
162a2(mdo sde): nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams lam la 'jud pa/ theg pa gsum
162a3(mdo sde): la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so// de ci'i
162a4(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi
162a5(mdo sde): khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan
162a6(mdo sde): 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba bskyed pa'i
162a7(mdo sde): sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
162b1(mdo sde): cang zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltaste/ dper na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la nig nor bu rin po che be DUR+Ya bor nus nor bu mching bul dmigs pa snyam du
162b2(mdo sde): sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni 'dra ba nyid du bdag la
162b3(mdo sde): gda' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag
162b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis ring po mi thogs pa chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor
162b5(mdo sde): de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag sum cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / rgyun bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus pa'i le'u'o//
162b6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de gzigs nas/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni chos don du gnyer ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par
162b7(mdo sde): mkhyems/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshud pa la 'jug pas ches par 'byung bsgrib pa med pa'i sgo'i ma bu chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu bgang pa'i phyirang mi 'jigs pas thobs pa sa bya ba'i 'ong bar skyes bu chen cha
163a1(mdo sde): mtshan spyi gtsug nas byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de phyung ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas te
163a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i lus la lan brgyar bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i spyi gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to//
163a3(mdo sde): 'od des byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la reg ma thag tu/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang
163a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'od dang / seng ge'i khri dang / lus brgya 'gyur du zil gyis mnan nas/ lam me lhang nge lhan ne'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug
163a5(mdo sde): gi rgyal pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs rig nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka
163a6(mdo sde): la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yu ba ni bai DUR+Ya/ g.yogs
163a7(mdo sde): ma gser/ snying po ni rin po che ne tso 'am tsi rtsibs ni an+da rnyil las byas pa/ mu tig gi do shal rab tu dpyangs pa/ dar gyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba 'khrol ba/
163b1(mdo sde): / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis bzung ba/ rgyar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byin gyis brlabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po
163b2(mdo sde): che'i gdugs de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas me tog gi char yang phab ste/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs
163b3(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / kun tu snang ba kun nas 'od zer can// don rnams ma lus ston pa kun nas spyan// rang byung chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas// bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan
163b4(mdo sde): kun dang ldan/ / skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni 'od zer phyung // zhal yang rnam par sbyong zhing 'od mdzad pa// 'dren pa des ni bdag gi lus la yang // lan brgyar bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor zhi//
163b5(mdo sde): mi yi 'dren pa'i 'od kyis reg pas na// gang dag bdag gis sngon thob dran pa dang // blo gros spobs pa snang ba de bzhin gzungs// rnam pa sdong du khyad par 'phags par gyur// bdag lus rab
163b6(mdo sde): sim sems ni rnam par dag/ bdag gi blo gros dga' mgu mnyam par gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtha' yas dang // spobs pa bdag gi lus la rab tu zhugs// sangs rgyas mthu/
163b7(mdo sde): chen bsnyen par dka' ba la// nyam chung dag gis mnyes par bgyid mi nus// sangs rgyas gnang nas 'gro kun pan slad du// sangs rgyas la ni zhu ba zhu bar 'tshal// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems
164a1(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod 'jug dang / / 'jig rten rnam 'dren dag gis 'byung ba dang // snang dang nges 'byung rnam par sprul pa dang // dbang bskur ye shes yongs su zhu bar 'tshal/
164a2(mdo sde): theg mchog dam pa rtogs par khong chud cing // mtha' yas rgya che ba yi 'khor lhags dang // gang dag rgya chen chos don gnyer ba dag/ de dag kan smad sangs rgyas la yang zhu// bdud kyi dkyil
164a3(mdo sde): 'khor shin tu tshar bcad cing / / sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di ni shin tu bzung // bcom ldan phung po ma mchis dam chos mdzod// lus can rnams la bshad pa'i dus 'di lags// skyes bu khyu
164a4(mdo sde): mchog mkhyen pa mtha' yas pas/ / bcom ldan de la bdag gi blo mi chud// bde gshegs mkhyen pa shes pas mi dpogs pas// mkhas pa yangs pa bdag ni zhu bar 'tshal// ji ltar bcom
164a5(mdo sde): ldan khyod kyi mkhyen 'jug dang / / ji ltar yun ring nas ni bslabs pa dang // chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po rab bslabs pa// 'dren pa rnams kyi spyod yul bshad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems
164a6(mdo sde): dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
164a7(mdo sde): pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ni tshad ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ni yongs su mi skyo bar chos ston pa lags par rig cing de bzhin gshes
164b1(mdo sde): pa ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i thugs rje chen po la gnas par mthong nas don 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan dag ni gang lags/ bcom
164b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyan gang dag gis brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na mdzes pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi snang ba bsam gyis
164b3(mdo sde): mi khyab pa thob nas/ gti mug gi mun pa dang bral zhing the tsom ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi sgo chen po shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
164b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pa mchog dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa rnams lags
164b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa la zhugs pa dang / legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid pa dang / las kyi mtha' gdung ba ma man+di/
164b6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom zhing the tsom dang bral nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
164b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yul la mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dag yongs su 'tshal
165a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
165a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa blo shin tu rnam par nges pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug
165a3(mdo sde): pas mngon par 'phags pa'i chos kyi sgo de legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di
165a4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so// khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul tshad med pa la rnam par nges pa thob nas/ khyod blo rnam par nges pa 'di lta bus
165a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so/ / de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
165a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos ji ltar yon tan 'di dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob
165a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom
165b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan dang
165b2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan dang / shes rab kyi rgyan dang / gzungs kyi rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems
165b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyun ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
165b4(mdo sde): gnod pa mi byed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang ba'i sems med pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/
165b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyar ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro'i sgo gcod pa
165b6(mdo sde): bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus
165b7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang / ngag rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag
166a1(mdo sde): ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang 'dod pa de 'byor pa dang / gang smon pa de yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gang 'dod pa de thob pa dang / gang rtsom pa
166a2(mdo sde): de nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrim
166a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgyu med pa yin/ shes rab sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba sgyu med pa yin/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba sgyu med pa yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das
166a4(mdo sde): pa chen po bla na med pa yin te/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yid la gcags
166a5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir skyon med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'dren ma ma yin pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyir/ 'dres
166a6(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / dge ba'i chos shin tu rnam par 'phel ba'i phyir/ sra sre ma yin pa'i tshul khrims dang / gang gis 'dod par 'gro ba'i tshul khrims kyi phyir rang dga'i tshul
166a7(mdo sde): khrims dang / gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i shes pas/ rang gi dbang sgyur ba'i tshul khrims te/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bdun
166b1(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang / bsam
166b2(mdo sde): gtan rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / thabs rnam par dag pa dang / bag yod pa rnam par dag pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
166b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par 'phro ba med pa
166b4(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhod pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dal
166b5(mdo sde): pab phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni dgu po
166b6(mdo sde): 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jigs pa med pa yin/ skrag pa med pa yin/ bsam pa nges pa yin/ nye bar zhi ba yin/ bsil ba yin/ bcings pa lhod pa yin/
166b7(mdo sde): sems las su rung ba yin/ sems cad shes pa yin/ dul ba'i sa rjes su thob pa yin te/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'ang
167a1(mdo sde): dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rgyan dang / dzi kad smras pa de bzhin byed pa'i phyir ngag
167a2(mdo sde): gi rgyan dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyan dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ zhing gi rgyan dang / bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir sems can yongs su smin
167a3(mdo sde): par byed pa'i rgyan dang / sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir/ skye ba'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa la rjes su slob pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan dang /
167a4(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa'i phyir shes pa'i rgyan dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan dang / tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa mi 'dor ba'i phyir/ stobs dang
167a5(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rgyan te/ rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi rgyan no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'
167a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la
167a7(mdo sde): byams pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang ba dang / mnyen
167b1(mdo sde): pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med
167b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bcos pa med pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
167b3(mdo sde): 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba yin par mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba
167b4(mdo sde): ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa lnga spong ba ste/ lnga po de dag
167b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid dang / rgod pa dang / 'dod pa dang / the tsom ste/ sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag spong ba'o//
167b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
167b7(mdo sde): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
168a1(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa ste/ dran pa
168a2(mdo sde): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
168a3(mdo sde): shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs
168a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa ste/ 'di ltar yang
168a5(mdo sde): dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang
168a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na
168a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' brjed pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa
168b1(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par
168b2(mdo sde): byas te gnas so/ / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i
168b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te
168b4(mdo sde): bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par
168b5(mdo sde): byas te gnas so/ / de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa bdang
168b6(mdo sde): snyoms dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i
168b7(mdo sde): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
169a1(mdo sde): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par
169a2(mdo sde): byas te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// /
169a3(mdo sde): de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
169a4(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i /
169a5(mdo sde): mngon sum du yang mi byed la/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yang langs nas sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu
169a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'khrugs pas nges par sems pa dang / zhi gnas yongs su rdzogs par byed
169a7(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par brtson par mi 'dor ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog sbed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba dang / sems dben pa dang / lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang
169b1(mdo sde): chos rnams la sems shing 'jal la so sor rtog pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs rab tu 'thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge
169b2(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/
169b3(mdo sde): gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la the tsom med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis
169b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'gyod pa dang bral ba dang / kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag
169b5(mdo sde): ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gti mug spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs nges par gcog pa dang / mun pa mun nag sel ba ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu
169b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang ba'i snang ba
169b7(mdo sde): dang 'gog pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon gsal dang / lam bsgom pa'i byin gyis rlabs te/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni
170a1(mdo sde): po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dmigs pa med pas tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / shes rab mchog gi bsam gtan pa yin pas/
170a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / gnyis dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
170a3(mdo sde): phung po yongs su dag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid pas/ chos kyi phung po yongs su dag pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab
170a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas/ bdag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang
170a5(mdo sde): rmi lam dang mnyam pa nyid pas sems can gyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pas/ byang chub kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul
170a6(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phyir lus kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / brag cha lta bu'i shes pas ngag gi 'khor yongs su dag pa dang / sgyu ma dang mnyam pa nyid pas
170a7(mdo sde): sems kyi 'khor yongs su dag pa'o/ / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyes par spras pa'i tshig rnams la khong khro ba med yongs su dag pa dang / bstod pa dang /
170b1(mdo sde): bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'chags pa spong ba yongs su dag pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dag la chos kyi sku rab tu rtog pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su
170b2(mdo sde): dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khor ba rmi lam lta bur mos pas yongs su mi skyo ba yongs su dag pa dang / rdo rje lta bu'i bsam pas brtan pa yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan ma thams
170b3(mdo sde): cad las sgrol bas/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gyur bar shes pas/ de las ma
170b4(mdo sde): chags pa yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa med pas lhag mthong yongs su dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa skyed pas dmigs yongs su dag pa'o// 'khor gsum yongs su dag
170b5(mdo sde): pa'i thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
170b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi rgyan ni phyir smon lam yongs su dag pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa
170b7(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis lus dang
171a1(mdo sde): sems dben pa dang / dbang po rnams la dbang por yongs su shes pa dang / stobs rnams kyis bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan la/
171a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / lam rnams la 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi
171a3(mdo sde): rgyun ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu zhi ba'i phyir zhi gnas shes pa dang / rab rib dang bral ba'i phyir lhag mthong shes pa dang / chos kyi phung po rjes su
171a4(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i phyir phung po shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir khams shes pa dang / grong stong pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye mched shes pa dang / bdag med pa'i phyir rten cing
171a5(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i phyir bden pa shes pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu rtog pas chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs
171a6(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' dag pas 'das pa shes pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dag pas ma 'ongs shes pa
171a7(mdo sde): dang bar gyi mtha' dag pas/ da ltar byung ba shes pa dang / rgyu chud mi za bas nges pa rnam pa shes pa dang / rkyen phye bar sgrub pas ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / yongs su smin par byed pas/
171b1(mdo sde): log pa nyid du ma nges pa rnams shes pa dang / chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa/
171b2(mdo sde): nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rgyan ni
171b3(mdo sde): bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir rmi lam lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par
171b4(mdo sde): 'khrul pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir smig rgyu lta bur shes pa dang / 'pho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pa dang / 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mig yor lta bur shes pa dang / rkyen gyi mtsham /
171b5(mdo sde): nyid kyi phyir brag cha lta bur shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / de bzhin nyid gnas med pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mi 'khrugs pa'i
171b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyar ni bcu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
171b7(mdo sde): gzungs kyi rgyan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa brjed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gcig go// rigs kyi bu byang
172a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gnyis po 'di dag ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa ste/ gnyis po 'di dag go
172a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni gsum po 'di dag ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la mkhas pa dang / tshig 'bru la mkhas pa dang / nges pa'i
172a3(mdo sde): tshig la mkhas pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chags pa med pa'i
172a4(mdo sde): tshig dang / rtsub pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rab tu 'gro ba'i cho ga dang / brdzun pa med pa'i tshig ste/ bzhi po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni
172a5(mdo sde): lnga po 'di dag ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa thams cad kyi nang nas don la rton pa dang / yi ge'i tshogs thams cad kyi nang nas ye shes la rton pa dang / mdo sde thams cad kyi nang nas
172a6(mdo sde): nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa dang / gang zag gi sgra thams cad las chos nyid la rton pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las 'jig rten las 'das pa la rngon pa ste/ lnga po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu
172a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni drug po 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i tshig rab tu 'thob pa dang /
172b1(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pas gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / g.yo med pas blang bar 'os pa'i tshig dang / snying rje chen po la sbyor bas 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa dang / snod pa la mkhas pas chad par chos ston
172b2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten shes pas dus su chos ston pa ste/ drug po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bdun po 'di dag ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta
172b3(mdo sde): ste/ mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang / shugs can gyi spobs pa dang / myur ba'i spobs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun chad med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs
172b4(mdo sde): pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa ste/ bdun po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
172b5(mdo sde): lha'i skad shes pa dang / klu'i skad shes pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi skad shes pa dang / dri za'i skad shes pa dang / lha ma yin gyi skad shes pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi skad shes pa dang / mi 'am ci'i skad shes pa
172b6(mdo sde): dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bar gyi skad shes pa ste/ brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni dgu po 'di dag ste/ dgu gang
172b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gyi nang du spa gong ba med pa dang / smra ba'i nang du zhum pa med pa dang / chos bshad pa'i nang du 'jigs pa med pa dang / 'dri ba rnams la nges par 'byung ba shes pa dang / mngon
173a1(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can rnams la snrel zhing bstan pa shes pa dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rjes su mthun pa bstan pa shes pa dang / khengs pa dag la lag na rdo rje ston pa/
173a2(mdo sde): dang mngon par chags pa rnams la theg pa'i bskal pa ston pa dang / yongs su smin pa rnams la theg pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa ste/ dgu po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub
173a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dogs pa thams cad la the tshom med par ston pa shes pa dang / blos chos bskyed pa'i sgo dang / shes
173a4(mdo sde): rab kyi snang ba gzhan la rag ma las pa dang / yi ge bstan pa mi zad pa dang / don bstan pa rgyun chad pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa yang dag pa rab tu brjod pa dang / kun
173a5(mdo sde): nas nyon mongs pa'i skyon mu med par brjod pa dang / rnam par byang ba bsngags pa tshad med pa ston pa dang / dbang po thams cad la gzhol bar 'jug pa chags pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang ba'i
173a6(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs kyi rgyan ni bcu po 'di dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir
173a7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / gang gis theg mchog dam pa 'di mdzes pa// blo gros chen po rnams kyi rgyan bzhi ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab mchog/ shin tu
173b1(mdo sde): rnam nges don dang de bzhin gzungs/ / de ni lus can kun gyi yid 'ong dka'// lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid dag cing // de yi rnam par lhung ba kun 'chad pa// 'di ni tshul khrims ldan pa'i
173b2(mdo sde): rgyan yin no/ / lA mi rnams kyi nang du mkhas pa skye// de yi smon lam ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'brug/ nan tan snying por byed dang yang dag ldan// 'di ni tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan yin no// de yi ting 'dzin
173b3(mdo sde): sgyu ma ma yin te/ / shes rab rnam grol de bzhin ye shes mthong // de yi mya ngan 'das pa sgyu ma yin// 'di ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims skyon med tshul khrims rnam par dag
173b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims sra sre ma yin 'dren ma med/ / de yi rang dga' de bzhin rang dbang yin// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// tshul khrims kyis ni sbyin pa dag par 'gyur// bzod pa dag
173b5(mdo sde): cing de bzhin brtson 'grus dag/ bsam gtan dag cing de bzhin shes rab dag/ thabs dang de bzhin bag yod dag pa yin// g.yo ba med cing gtan la shin tu gnas// sa mchog thob cing rnal 'byor
173b6(mdo sde): rnam 'phro med/ / lhod pa spangs shing dgang sla gso yang sla// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// brtson 'grus 'bar zhing tshul khrims bsngags pa ste// de yi sems ni nam yang gdung mi
173b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / de la yid la gcags par 'gyur med de// 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag mi num ste// bsam pa nges shing zhi la yid rab ni// 'dir ni de yi
174a1(mdo sde): bcing ba sdod par gyur/ / 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyun// grags chen sems ni las su rung ba yin// de ni dul zhing de bzhin cang shes yid// 'di ni
174a2(mdo sde): rang lus mtshan gyi rgyan byed pa/ / 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// mkhas pa de ni ngag gi rgyan thob ste// de ni nyon mongs med pas rtag sems
174a3(mdo sde): rgyan/ 'di ni gang dag tshul khrims dag pa'i rgyan// khyad par 'phags pa'i zhing ni legs par brgyan// theg pa mchog la sems can yongs smin te// gang phyir sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas/
174a4(mdo sde): rang gi skye ba legs par rgyan pa byed// byang chub spyod pa rtag tu rgyan byed cing // byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dag rgyan byed cing // nga rgyal med pas shes pa legs
174a5(mdo sde): par rgyan/ / de ni byams pas sems can kun khyab byed// mkhas pa rtag tu dran pa mnyen pa yin// g.yo med cing ni sgyu med bcos pa med// gti mug 'dod sdang 'jigs pas 'gro ba yin// de ni sgrib pa
174a6(mdo sde): lnga po rnam par sel/ / bag yod gyur nas rjes su lam drug sgom// byang chub yan lag bdun dang lam sgom ste// mthar gyis dgu dang ting 'dzin bsam gtan byed// rnal 'byor pa ni zhi gnas nges
174a7(mdo sde): sems sbyor/ / de ni tshul bzhin dge ba chud mi gzon// dben dang shin tu sbyangs dang so sor rtog/ 'phags pa'i rigs la dbang ni sgyur ba yin// chos rnams la ni the tshom med par gyur// de la
174b1(mdo sde): / kun nas ldang dang 'gyod pa med// de la ma rig gti mug mun pa med// bden pa snang zhing yongs su shes pa shes// tshul khrims dag pa dmigs pa med pa ste// shes rab dam pa bsam
174b2(mdo sde): gtan ting 'dzin dag/ gnyis gsal nas ni rnam par grol ba dag/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med cing shes pa dag/ dus gsum dag la ye shes mthong mi chags// 'dod chags bral ba'i shes
174b3(mdo sde): pas chos kyang dag/ dag nas 'dir ni de la rlom sems med// 'di ni gang dag shes dang ldan pa'i rgyan// shes rab kyis ni sbyin pa brgyan gyur te// rmi lam sgyu ma tshol ba med pa'i phyir//
174b4(mdo sde): bdag dang byang chub de bzhin sems can rnams// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni tshul khrims brgyan gyur te// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma brag cha 'dra ba'i phyir//
174b5(mdo sde): lus dang ngag rnams dang ni de bzhin sems// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bzod par brgyan gyur te// mkhas dang mtho min dma' bar 'gyur min dang /
174b6(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos sku rtag tu rab rtog pa// 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni brtson 'grus brgyan gyur te// skyo ba med cing bsam pa brtan pa dang // de ni
174b7(mdo sde): zang ba med cing dor med pa/ / 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni bsam gtan brgyan gyur te// de la ma chags 'gyur dang lhag mthong dang // mkhas
175a1(mdo sde): dang mngon par shes pa bskyed pa dang / / 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam par sbyong // shes rab kyis ni thabs kyang rgyan byed de// shin tu 'dud dang bzungs dang yang
175a2(mdo sde): dag smon/ / 'khor gsum po dag de ni rnam skyong zhing // sems can chos dang de bzhin zhing rnams sbyong // dran pa nye bar gzhag la dran mi 'jug/ yang dag spong ba rnams la gnyis med de/
175a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis ni lus dang sems kyang dben// sems can gyis ni dbang po kun mi shes// bdud dang nyon mongs rnams kyis zil mi non// chos kyi rang bzhin tshul bzhin rjes su rtogs//
175a4(mdo sde): de bzhin lam la 'ong med 'gro ba med// 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// de ni shin tu zhi ba'i zhi gnas shes// de yi lhag mthong spyod yul mtha' yas te// chos kyi phung po ji bzhin
175a5(mdo sde): phung po shes/ / khams ni nam mkhar mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes// des ni stong pa lta bur skye mched shes// rten pas bsags pas chos rnams 'byung med de// don dam bden par 'khrugs pa
175a6(mdo sde): med par shes/ / tshul bzhin gyis ni nges par rtogs par shes// dus gsum la ni chags med ye shes 'jug/ rnam par gzhag phyir phung po gsum yang shes// dkon mchog gsum ni mtshan
175a7(mdo sde): nyid gcig tu shes/ / 'di ni gang dag shes rab ldan pa'i rgyan// rnam bsgrubs mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bur shes// yongs brtags rtsa ba rmi lam ji bzhin no// rnam 'khrul mtshan nyid smig rgyu 'dra ba ste/
175b1(mdo sde): 'pho med chos rnams gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid do// 'du 'phrod byung ba mig yor lta bu ste// rkyen rnams kyis ni brag cha ji bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings ni rtag tu ma 'dres shes// de bzhin nyid ni
175b2(mdo sde): gnas med de rab shes/ / yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mi g.yo chos// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas gnyis su med// shes rab zab cing blo ni rab yangs pa// brgyan nas sangs rgyas chos rnams
175b3(mdo sde): bar byed/ / de ni nam yang dran pa brjed pa med// chos rnams kun tu 'dzin cing 'dzin par byed// don dang tshig 'bru la ni rtag tu mkhas// nges tshig shes pa rtag par rtogs khong chud// chags
175b4(mdo sde): med tshig dang rtsub pa ma yin dang / / rab tu grol ba'i tshig dang brdzun med tshig/ thos pa kun don rtag tu rtog pa dang // mkhas pa de ni ye shes rngon par byed// nges don mdo sde rdogs par rab tu shes/
175b5(mdo sde): gang zag med pa'i chos nyid rton byed cing // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos nyid la yang rton// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// de yi tshig ni bden pa'i rjes su mthun// gzung
175b6(mdo sde): bar 'os dang dus su 'os pa yin/ / de yi chos bstan de ni 'bras bu yod// chad pa dang ni dus su rgyun chags 'jug/ de yi spobs pa mgyogs pa skye ba ste// shug can dang ni myur dang rtag
175b7(mdo sde): mi chags/ / rgyun chad med dang 'khrul med nges pa'i tshig/ legs par brgyus pa'i 'phrengs pas legs brgyan bzhin// lha dang klu yi skad ni rab tu shes// gnod sbyin dag dang dri za lha
176a1(mdo sde): min dang / / mkha' lding mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// sems can kun gyi skad kyang rab tu shes// 'khor lhags shes nas spa gong med pa ste// smra ba mthong nas
176a2(mdo sde): zhum par 'gyur ba'ang med/ / 'jigs pa med par chos kyi gtam yang brjod// 'dri ba rnams la nges 'byung rab tu shes// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can mthong snrel zhi yi// gtam brjod
176a3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor mthong nas rjes su mthun/ / nga rgyal can la lag na rdo rje ston// yul mngon chags la sreg pa'i bskal pa ste// theg pa gsum gyi rim pa'i gtam yang brjod// dogs pa kun
176a4(mdo sde): kyi the tshom gcod pa ste/ / blo yis chos rnams mngon sum gyur pa yin// de yi shes rab nam yang gzhan mi ltos// yi ge thams cad rtag tu zad med shes// don rnams nges pa dag la rgyun
176a5(mdo sde): chags te/ / de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas brjod// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa yin// kun nas nyon mongs skyon ni mtha' yas shes// rnam par byang ba'i phan yon thug
176a6(mdo sde): pa med/ / de bzhin sems can dbang po thams cad shes// sangs rgyas snang ba'i so so rig pa thob// de ni gzungs kyis brgyan par gyur pa ste// de yi yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang // bskal
176a7(mdo sde): par rgyun chad med par rab brjod kyang / / yon tan mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so// / bam po gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhan
176b1(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu snang ba gang dag gis snang bar gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' mun pa mun nag dang bral zhing / byang chub
176b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa spyod par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa'i snang ba dang / blo gros kyi
176b3(mdo sde): snang ba dang / rtogs pa'i snang ba dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / shes pa'i snang ba dang / bden pa'i snang ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu
176b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran snang ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang
176b5(mdo sde): ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma byas pa sogs pa dang / thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa
176b6(mdo sde): dang / don rnam par nges pa rjes su thob pa dang / yul drug gis mi 'phrogs pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos spong zhing dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dran pa rgya chen po phun sum
176b7(mdo sde): tshogs par gyur pa dang / de dran pa phun sum tshogs par rig nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi grong khyer srung bar 'jog pa dang / dran pa sngon du 'gro bas chos thams
177a1(mdo sde): cad la snang ba thob pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros
177a2(mdo sde): kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don gyi blo gros yin gyi/ tshig 'bru'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / ye shes kyi blo gros yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i blo gros ma
177a3(mdo sde): yin pa dang / chos kyi blo gros yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / rigs pa'i blo gros yin gyi/ 'gal ba'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi blo gros yin
177a4(mdo sde): gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma yin pa dang / rlabs po che'i blo gros yin gyi/ dman pa'i blo gros ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi blo gros yin gyi/ bdud kyi blo gros ma yin pa
177a5(mdo sde): dang snying rje chen po'i blo gros yin gyi/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i blo gros ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi
177a6(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / dgongs te bstan
177a7(mdo sde): pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa rnams rtogs par khong du chud par
177b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / snrel zhi'i rgyud bstan pa rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / spyi'u tsugs kyi rgyud brtan pa rtogs
177b2(mdo sde): par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go//
177b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams la las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa ston pas 'jig rten pa'i
177b4(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba dang / thar pa 'dod pa rnams la ye shes kyis ston pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / lam shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang /
177b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / srid pa dang / ma rig pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa mi slong ba'i phyir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / 'phags pa rnams kyi nges par gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir/
177b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi snang ba dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa la shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyi snang ba dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/
177b7(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'i chos kyi snang ba dang / chos rnams shin tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba ni
178a1(mdo sde): brgyad po 'di dag go/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ brgyad pa'i
178a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i snang ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i shes pa'i/
178a3(mdo sde): snang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa'i snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa'i snang ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi /
178a4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di/
178a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ bden pa bsgom pa gang gis nges par gyur pa la 'jug pa de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu dang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom/
178a6(mdo sde): pa gang gis 'bras bu gnyis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis 'bras bu gsum pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i sdang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang
178a7(mdo sde): gis 'bras bu bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis rang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis byang
178b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba dang / bden pa bsgom pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de la de'i snang ba ste/
178b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang
178b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig gis gzugs thams cad yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir gsal ba'i snang ba dang / lha'i rna bas sgra thams cad thos pa'i phyir/ nges par rtogs pa'i snang ba
178b4(mdo sde): dang sngon gyi gnas bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran pa'i phyir rjes su dran pa'i snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i phyir/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar snang ba
178b5(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i phyir/ nam mkha' sgrib pa med pa'i snang ba dang / zag pa med pa'i shes pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir shes pa'i
178b6(mdo sde): snang ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi snang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa'i phyir/ ye shes kyi tshogs kyi snang
178b7(mdo sde): ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i snang ba ni brgyad po 'di dag go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag ste/
179a1(mdo sde): dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'di sgrub pas ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas shes rab kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas blo'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas yang dag pa'i
179a2(mdo sde): lta ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas zhi gnas kyi snang ba dang / sgrub pas lhag mthong gi snang ba dang / sgrub pas sems can gyi bsam pa'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas 'khrugs pa med par sems
179a3(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i snang ba dang / sgrub pas shin tu mthar thug pa'i snang ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrub pa'i snang ba ni dgu po 'di dag go// de nas
179a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / dran pa de dang yang dag 'dres pas na// sngon chad las dge bsags pa chud mi zo na// phra bar sngo ba'i phun sum tshogs pa
179a5(mdo sde): de/ phyi phyir zhing ni yang dag sgrub par byed// thos pa'i chos rnams la ni brjed par med// rnam par nges pa myur du 'thob par 'gyur// nye bar zhi bas yul rnams las ni spras// dran dang
179a6(mdo sde): ldan pa mi dge rnams dang bral/ / dran pa rgya bo che ni shin tu bsags// bya ba bya ba dag ni rnam par 'byed// dran pa dag dang ldan par rig nas ni// rgyal ba rang byung dag gis byin gyis rlob//
179a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong byed pa// de ni 'gro ba rnams la chos ston nus// shes rab ldan pa mun pa rnam bral te// lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed// blo gros bzang ldan snang ba
179b1(mdo sde): thob gyur nas/ / dogs pa dang ni the tshom rnams kyang gcod// dran pa ldan pa rang byung ye shes kyis// byang chub myur du rjes su rtogs par byed// de ni don gyi blo gros can yin gyi// tshig 'bru'i
179b2(mdo sde): rjes su mi rgyug sgra la'ang min/ / sems can dag pa ye shes blo gros can// rnam par shes pa'i blo gros 'dod ma yin// chos kyi blo gros ldan par gyur pa de// nyon mongs blo gros sel cing
179b3(mdo sde): gti mug bral/ / shes rab dang ni thabs kyi tshul shes pa// de ni rgyal ba'i byang chub 'gal mi byed// de ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i blo gros ldan// nyan thos 'gyur min rang rgyal 'gyur ma
179b4(mdo sde): yin/ / rtag tu rlabs chen blo gros can yin gyi// de ni blo gros chung ngu 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas blo gros rtag tu ldan yin gyi// bdud kyi blo gros su ni 'gyur ma yin// blo gros ldan pa/
179b5(mdo sde): snying rje cher gzhol gyi// sems can gang la'ang rnam par 'tshe ba min// chos 'ga' bstan pa gang yin de la ni// the tshom med cing rtogs pa khong du chud// de ni dgongs te gsungs la
179b6(mdo sde): mkhas 'gyur zhing / / sems can spyod pa rnams la rtogs dang ldan// so so yang dag rig la rtogs ldan zhing // de yi shes pa 'jug pa chags pa med// rkyen byung byed pa po dang rnam bral
179b7(mdo sde): bar/ / rten pa'i chos rnams dag ni rab tu shes// de ni snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas gyur cing // spyi'u tshugs tshul ni rtogs par khong du chud// sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bshad ji snyed pa/
180a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ni rtogs par khong du chud// 'jig rten pa yi chos kyi snang ba yis// lha mi rnams kyi las kyi bya ba shes// 'jig rten las ni 'das pa'i ye shes kyis//
180a2(mdo sde): shes rab snang ba dang ni ldan pa yin// kha na ma thor bcas dang ma tho med// ye shes rab tu gsal ba chen po 'jug/ lam ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'bras bu yod pa'i
180a3(mdo sde): chos ston to/ / zag par bcas dang zag pa med pa yi// chos la de yi snang ba rab tu 'jug/ de ni zag pa thams cad spong byed cing // lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don kyang byed// 'dus ma byas
180a4(mdo sde): dang 'dus byas chos rnams la/ / de yi shes pa rtag tu rab tu 'jug/ de ni de yis dri bral rab rib med// skyon med thob nas sdud pa rnams kyang spyod// rnam par byang dang kun nas nyon mongs
