268b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis gzungs rnam par nges pa bstan pa 'di legs par bshad pa dang / ji ltar yang khyod chos 'di dag la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / ji ltar yang
268b2(mdo sde): khyod sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i tshig zab mo rnams yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa legs so legs so/ / de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
268b3(mdo sde): bo khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgyas pa/
268b4(mdo sde): tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rnam par snang byed kyi bskal pa la/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes
268b5(mdo sde): bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo / / 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa de'ang bai DUR+Ya dag par gyur te/ me long lta bur shin tu byi dor byas pa lag
268b6(mdo sde): mthil ltar mnyam pa'o/ / 'jig rten gyi khams der rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rin po che'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan pa dag byung bar gyur to//
268b7(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur pa/ sna tshogs pa blta na sdug pa dag kyang byung bar gyur to// lha dang mi de dag kyang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa la yongs
269a1(mdo sde): su longs spyod par gyur to/ / zas dang skom yang bsams pa tsam gyi 'byor te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod
269a2(mdo sde): palha dang mi dag gi longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa'ang de 'dra bar gyur to/ / lha dang mi de dag kyang 'dod chags chung ba/ zhe sdang chung ba/ gti mug chung ba/ rnam par bzang ba shin tu rnam
269a3(mdo sde): par rig par byed par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na nyi ma dang zla bar btags pa rnams med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i lus kyi 'od kyis
269a4(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gsal bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na pad+ma kha zums pas mtshan mo zhes bya ba dang / pad+ma kha bye bas nyin mor bgrangs pa ma gtogs
269a5(mdo sde): par nyin mtshan du gdags pa med do/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba snyoms par zhug
269a6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag drug cur gyur to/ / khyim pa tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de na theg pa chen po ma
269a7(mdo sde): gtogs par theg pa rnam par dgod pa gzhan med par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ni phyir mi ldog pa dag pa'i gtam yang dag par ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa byed
269b1(mdo sde): du gyur to/ / mi rnams kyang bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gang dag sa la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni mi zhes bya ba'i grangs
269b2(mdo sde): su 'gro'o/ / gang dag nam mkha' la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams na gnas pa de dag ni lha zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ma gtogs par/ lha dang mi rnams kyi kha dog dang // yongs
269b3(mdo sde): su spyod pa tha dad du bya ba med par gyur to/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med do// lha dang mi de dag thams
269b4(mdo sde): cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa dang / chos nyan pa la 'dun par gyur pa ma gtogs par lha gzhan med/ ston pa gzhan med/ gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal/ las
269b5(mdo sde): gzhan mi byed/ gzhan yid la mi byed par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med du gdags pa med do// sems can de dag bslab pa gsum po dag la slob pa ma gtogs par lhung
269b6(mdo sde): bar gdags pa med do/ / bslab pa las 'da' bar gdags pa med do// bslab pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang / lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab
269b7(mdo sde): pa dang / lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o// de la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi gtong ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa thams
270a1(mdo sde): cad rnam par spong ba'o/ / de la lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas lhag pa'i shes rab thob pa'o// de la lhag pa'i shes rab
270a2(mdo sde): kyi bslab pa gang zhe na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu gnas nas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lung phog pa med par bslab pa 'di lta bu dag
270a3(mdo sde): la slob pa dag go/ / 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i chos bstan pa'ang de lta bur yongs su dag par gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
270a4(mdo sde): 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
270a5(mdo sde): 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs gang la rab tu gnas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu
270a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / chos bstan pa na zad par mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par bgyid pa'i gzungs de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
270a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
270b1(mdo sde): la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ / rigs kyi bu rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gzungs de la rab tu gnas nas/
270b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin to// legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
270b3(mdo sde): dri ma med par snang ba la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag de bzhin du sgrub cing gzungs 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba/
270b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs la gang cung zad 'jug pa tsam zhig legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang bas byang chub sems dpa'
270b5(mdo sde): 'od dpal la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs rnams kyi rdul dang bral gyur te// dri ma med cing dri ma kun tu spangs// sems ni rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// 'di ni rin chen smon
270b6(mdo sde): ma'i gzungs yin no/ / lus kyis ngag rnams dag cing yid kyis ni// zla ba lta bur dri bral dri med 'od// byams pa'i sems dang yid kyang snyoms gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs/
270b7(mdo sde): yin no// gnyis su lta ba dag las rnam grol zhing // rtog dang rnam par rtog de kun tu bral// 'du shes rnams ni yongs su shes gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no//
271a1(mdo sde): dran dang blo gros rtogs la 'jug par 'grub// shes rab che ldan yon tan rnams dang ldan/ nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dri ma med cing dag/ 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzung
271a2(mdo sde): yin no/ / dkon mchog gsum po rgyan mi 'chad pa dang // dri gsum rnam spangs srid pa gsum las grol// gnyis la yid gnyis za ba mthar 'byin pa// rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni dag pa
271a3(mdo sde): yin/ 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang gti mug bcom// dus ngan skyon spangs yon tan kun dang ldan// nyon mongs mun pa rab rib sel byed pa// rin chen sgron ma gzungs kyi mchog yin no//
271a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten dag na sgra skad tha ma dang // 'bring dang mchog ni ji snyed yod pa dag/ sgra rnams kun la shin tu zhugs gyur pa// rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs ni rdul dang bral// zab mo'i tshogs
271a5(mdo sde): rnams dang ni ldan gyur cing / / tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs mtha' yas mang // bdag dang sems can dag tu lhung ba med// gnyis med ldan pa 'di ni gzungs yin no// so so yang dag
271a6(mdo sde): rig ma thob gyur cing / / rkang pa snying po bzhi la rab gnas te// bsam gtan bzhi dang yang dag rab ldan pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dam pa'i don gyi chos kyi tshul gyur cing //
271a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang bsdu dang ldan// mngon par shes pa lnga la 'gro byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas// yang dag slong
271b1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang rtag tu 'thun/ / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi la skyod byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// dbang po lnga po dag dang ldan gyur cing // stobs lnga dag la gnas pa mi
271b2(mdo sde): g.yo'i shugs/ / byang chub yan lag rnams dang rab ldan pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// yan lag brkyang ba'i lam gyis 'gro byed cing // zhi gnas mchog dang lhag mthong
271b3(mdo sde): zung ngu 'brel/ / rig dang rnam par grol bas 'gro byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// sa rnams gnon pa dag ni rab ldan zhing // mtshams sbyor grol ba'i lam dang rjes su
271b4(mdo sde): 'thun/ / nyes pa rnams ni kun tu spangs gyur pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// 'jig rten thams cad na ni snang byed cing // nyi dang zla ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ltar//
271b5(mdo sde): rnam par dag cing mig ni 'byed byed pa// 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs yin no// 'dir ni lha mig dag ste rab rib med// shes rab mchog gi mig kyang rnam par dag/ 'dir ni
271b6(mdo sde): chos kyi mig kyang dag gyur te/ / rgyal ba dam pa'i spyan ni rnam par dag/ 'dir ni nyon mongs bdud kyang dag par gyur// phung po lnga yi nyes pa 'dir yongs dag/ 'dir ni 'chi bdag
271b7(mdo sde): bdun kyang dag gyur cing / / 'di ni sde dang bcas pa'i bdud kyang bcom// 'dir ni gzungs la rab tu gnas nas su// bye ba khrag khrig dag gi zhing du 'gro// sangs rgyas khrag khrig dag kyang /
272a1(mdo sde): mthong 'gyur zhing // bla na med pa'i chos kyang nyan par byed// rgya chen chos ni thos par gyur nas kyang // gzungs kyi dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin par byed// don
272a2(mdo sde): dang tshig 'bru dag kyang zung ldan par/ / sems ldan thams cad la ni ston par byed// rgyu dang rkyen gyis rnam par phye bas na// sems ni skad cig 'jig par shes gyur te// chos rnams rab
272a3(mdo sde): tu dbye ba shes thob pa/ / gzungs 'di la ni gnas par gyur pa yin// spobs pa thob cing gsum rig chags pa med// mig gsum rnam par dag pa'ang rab tu thob// rnam par thar pa
272a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi don kyang thob/ / 'dir ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur dang ldan// gang dag gzungs rnams mang po gzhal yas shing // tshad med pa dag nges par bstan pa yang // gzungs/
272a5(mdo sde): kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na// de dag thams cad rab tu thob par 'gyur// bsam gtan gang dag rnam thar gang dag dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin gang dag mtha' yas dang // mngon
272a6(mdo sde): par shes pas rnam par rol dang gzungs/ / mtha' yas de dag la ni rab tu 'jug/ ji ltar rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa la// mtha' yas sgo nas rlung mtsho mtshe'u 'jug pa// de ltar
272a7(mdo sde): gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa yang / / mtha' yas chos rnams kyi ni sgo mor 'jug/ zad pa med pa'i sgra la 'jug pa yang // zad pa med pa'i shes pas khong du chud// gzungs 'di
272b1(mdo sde): smra bar byed pa de yi ni/ / bsod nams thams cad zad par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa ni// rin chen dam pa ni med lag tu 'gyur// gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang ni/
272b2(mdo sde): rigs dang yang // rus dang skye ba dag ni rnam par dag/ zab mo'i tshul dag la ni 'jug pa dang // mi skye ba la bzod dang ma skyes dang // phyir mi ldog pa'i shes pa'i sa dag kyang // gzungs
272b3(mdo sde): 'di yin par nges par bstan pa yin/ / byang chub bla med mchog 'di tshol byed pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mang po gang dag gis// gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur na ni// byang chub bla na med/
272b4(mdo sde): pa rnyed mi dka'// gang dag phyogs bcu rnams na bde bar gshegs// 'gro la phan dang bde phyir chos ston pa// gzungs kyi dam pa 'di ni thob gyur na// de dag spobs pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur ro//
272b5(mdo sde): gzungs 'di rab tu thob par gyur pa dag/ dga' dang mos dang bsam pa shes nas ni// de dag 'a bras bu yod pa ston pas na// sems can khrag khrig dag ni tshim par byed// gzungs 'di la ni
272b6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i dpa' bo dag/ 'khor lo dam pa rab tu skor byed cing // sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams las 'grel// theg pa dam pa la yang 'jog par byed// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
272b7(mdo sde): mang por ni/ / bsngags dang yon tan legs par brjod byas kyang // drang srong chen pos de yi yon tan gyi// mtha' ma brjod du nus par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
273a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba des gzungs bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de las byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
273a2(mdo sde): gzungs thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal gyis ni rin chen sgron ma'i gzungs 'di thob par gyur to// gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na
273a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing / yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za bar blta na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe
273a4(mdo sde): na khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'od dpal zhes bya bar gyur to/ / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po khyod kyis de tshun chad bgrang ba las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag la gzungs
273a5(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa 'di yongs su dris so/ / yongs su dri ba byas so// des na khyod da lta yang de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su 'dri ba la de ltar 'jigs pa med cing / gzungs kyi rnam par nges pa 'di'ang
273a6(mdo sde): ston to/ / khyod kun tu lta ba'i blos chos 'di mngon sum du gyur pas/ rnam grangs 'dis na ngas khyod byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi /
273a7(mdo sde): mchog tu bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
273b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas rin chen smon ma'i gzungs 'di rab tu 'thob cing / thob nas kyang chab 'tshal bar mi bgyid pa dang / 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pas
273b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
273b3(mdo sde): kyibu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rtsa ba la gnas par gyur pa dang / shes rab kyi las byed par gyur pa de'i tshe gzungs 'di rab tu thob bo// chud za bar mi byed do// sems can tham
273b4(mdo sde): cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar yang 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
273b5(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rtsa ba ni gang lags/ shes rab kyi las ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/
273b6(mdo sde): khyod shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ji ltar/
273b7(mdo sde): thos pa'i chos gzhan dgal rgya cher yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so// dpyod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang dpyad pa gzhan dag la nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi
274a1(mdo sde): so/ / nam pa migs rab // sems can rnams rgyal ba zhin larab tu dasod pa 'ang gas sa kyim// yang dag par byu
274a2(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi las so// sems la nges par sems pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems la nges par sems pa yang dag par ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so//
274a3(mdo sde): rab tu dben par gnas pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems dben par shes pa na shes rab kyi las so// gcig pur dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gcig pur bgrod pa'i lam sgrub
274a4(mdo sde): pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rig pa dang rnam par grol ba 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rnam par thar pa gsum sgom pa ni shes
274a5(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / rig pa gsum mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni shes
274a6(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ / yang dag par spong ba sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis spangs par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
274a7(mdo sde): sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rdzu 'phrul thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dad pas mos te yid ches pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chags pa thams
274b1(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ni shes rab kyi las so/ / sems mi 'dzum pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// dran pa dang shes
274b2(mdo sde): bzhin ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / dran pas bya ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi las so// ting nge 'dzin rim gyis rjes su rtogs par byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rtag tu mnyam
274b3(mdo sde): par gnas pa 'thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / shes rab kyi dbang po la rten pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so//
274b4(mdo sde): stobs lnga'i gnas shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bdud dang nyon mongs pas mi rdzi ba ni shes rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi yan lag dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab
274b5(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o/ / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// lam gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad gzings lta
274b6(mdo sde): bur shes nas chos dang chos ma yin pa la mi gnas pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / sduka bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa/ lam sgom pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'gog pa
274b7(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde kun chub par byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nges pa'i don gyi mdo la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// thos pa thams
275a1(mdo sde): cad 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / don la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rnam par shes pa la so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// ye shes la rton pa
275a2(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi las so/ / gang zag gi sgra la mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos nyid la rton pa ni shes rab kyi las so// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par so sor rtog pa
275a3(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / gdod ma nas ma skyes par rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams
275a4(mdo sde): cad mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / chos thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// sems can gzod ma nas rnam par dag par
275a5(mdo sde): shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / mya ngan las 'dres pa la zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes pa ni shes
275a6(mdo sde): rab kyi las so/ / don thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// de na so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// yang dag pa'i chos nyid thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab
275a7(mdo sde): kyi rtsa ba'o/ / chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni shes rab kyi las so// nges pa'i tshig thams cad la skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig
275b1(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi las so/ / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thos nas skrag pa med pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni she rab kyi las so// sems can la dmigs pa/
275b2(mdo sde): dang / chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni shes rab kyi las so// bdag la byed pa dang / gzhan la byed pa la snying rje ni shes
275b3(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / mtha' gnyis ka bsal ba'i snying rje chen po ni shes rab kyi las so// chos la sems pa la mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'i dga' ba ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// blang ba med pa
275b4(mdo sde): dang dor ba med pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba'i btang snyoms ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gnyis dang bral ba ni shes rab kyi las so//
275b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// chos kyi sku rab tu shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid ni
275b6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi las so/ / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'dus ma byas su so sor rtogs pa ni shes rab kyi las so// gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o//
275b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni shes rab kyi las so// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba 'o// tshul khrims mngon par 'du bya ba med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi
276a1(mdo sde): las so/ / lha rjes su dran pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ni shes rab kyi las so// thos pa la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'jig
276a2(mdo sde): rten thams cad la rtog pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / ma byas pa'i las byed pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// nga rgyal med pa ni
276a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / ye shes chen po thob pa ni shes rab kyi las so// bdag gi don ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gnyis ka'i don ni shes rab kyi las so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
276a4(mdo sde): stong kun tu 'dzin pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yongs su shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// chos bstan pa shes pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// 'bras bu
276a5(mdo sde): yod pa'i chos ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so/ / sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs
276a6(mdo sde): mkhas pas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god pa 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/ / srid par 'gro bar skye ba thams cad kyis skrag pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bsams
276a7(mdo sde): bzhin du skye ba ni shes rab kyi las so/ / sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so// zad pa shes pa ni shes
276b1(mdo sde): rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / mi skye ba'i shes pa ni shes rab kyi las so// rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni shes rab kyi las so// phyir mi
276b2(mdo sde): ldog pa'i sa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/ / dbang bskur ba'i sa ni shes rab kyi las so// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// gang ci shes par bya ba dang
276b3(mdo sde): thob par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba de thams cad sems kyis skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzos
276b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi las so/ / shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zangs med
276b5(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ / 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'
276b6(mdo sde): shes rab brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa 'di dag rab tu g.yos par gyur pa
276b7(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
277a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang las bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon bshad pa na/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis
277a2(mdo sde): nam mkha' yongs su 'dzin pa 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la yongs su dris shing yongs su dri ba byas te/ sa chen po g.yo ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di yin no// rkyen ni 'di
277a3(mdo sde): yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa la spobs pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub
277a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs pa la shes rab brtsegs zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la/
277a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du gyur pa 'jig rten du byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi
277a6(mdo sde): khams 'byung ba bzang po de'i sems can rnams ni bde bar tshim pas gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa'
277a7(mdo sde): stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gyur to/ / de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni nyan thos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
277b1(mdo sde): sbas des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spobs pa rgya chen po nye bar gzung ste/ dri ba bye ba zag brgya ched du mdza byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa
277b2(mdo sde): khyed kyi nang nas su dus ji srid cig na dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po 'di dri ba re re la bstan pa bye ba phrag brgya brgyas lan 'debs par spro/ de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis gsol pa
277b3(mdo sde): mtshan mo 'di bas te lan gdab par bgyi'o/ / kha cig gis gsol pa/ dkrung bdun na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ dgung tha byed na'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
277b4(mdo sde): 'das dris pa 'di dag bdag cag gis dgung zla gcig na lan gdab par bgyi'o/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'dug par
277b5(mdo sde): gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal spras de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag stan las mi ldang zhing spyod lam 'khrug pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs
277b6(mdo sde): padabang du bgyi ste/ dri ba 'di bas par lan gdab par bgyi'o// skyes bu dam pa des seng ge'i sgra bsgrags ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu
277b7(mdo sde): g.yos so/ / snang ba chen po'ang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to// snang ba des bskul nas sa bla'i lha nas bzung ste/ ka nas katsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams 'dus so// dge slong
278a1(mdo sde): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po'ang 'dir 'dus par gyur to// de ltar skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dpag
278a2(mdo sde): tshad stong phrag bcur 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gnas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blos 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mthong nas/ rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs
278a3(mdo sde): dang ye shes kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / gzugs kyi stobs dang / spobs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kI thams dang
278a4(mdo sde): stobs kyi dri ba ched du mdzad pa bye ba phrag brgya po de dag kun tu bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i mdun du dri ba bye ba phrag brgya po re re la bstan pa'i
278a5(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgyas lan btab ste/ byed pa dang / rgyun chad pa med pa dang / rjes su ldan pa dang / rjes su 'brel ba dang / tshig dang yig 'brur ldan pa shin tu nges
278a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig rnams kyis de'i lan btab pa dang / 'khor de las srog chags stong phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa'
278a7(mdo sde): stong phrag pa ni bcu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sbas des de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so zhes bya
278b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams da nas kyis go bar byas so/ / sa r+b+ba'i lha rnams nas bzung / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kye ma gang /
278b2(mdo sde): shes rab dang / spobs pa dang / bstan pa 'di 'dra ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs su 'gyur ro zhes smra phyung ste smra bsgrags so// de ltar na de shes rab brtsegs zhes ming
278b3(mdo sde): du btags so/ / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du dogs shing yid gnyis su gyur tam/ the tshom za ba lta na khyod kyis
278b4(mdo sde): de ltar mi blta'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i blo zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
278b5(mdo sde): kyis don 'di rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / ma myos gyur nas ma thos chos rnams rtag nyan pa// shes rab rtsa ba sems can dag pas thos nas ni//
278b6(mdo sde): 'dzin cing byams pas 'gro ba dag la ston byed pa// shes rab las te byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu byed// dpyod pa'i dran pa chen po 'di ni shes rab rtsa// dpyad nas 'gro la rtag tu ston pa
278b7(mdo sde): shes rab las/ / gal te tshul bzhin rab sreg 'di ni shes rab rtsa// de la sbyar nas ston pa shes rab las shes bya// yang dag sbyor la gal te sbyor ba shes rab rtsa// grub cing ston par byed pa
279a1(mdo sde): de ni shes rab las/ / sems la nges par sems rnyed 'di ni shes rab rtsa// nges par sems par spyod pa 'di ni shes rab las// gcig pu dben par spyod pa 'di ni shes
279a2(mdo sde): rab rtsa/ / lus dang sems la nga'i med pa 'di ni shes rab las// gang tshe 'du 'dzes 'jigs gyur de ni shes rab rtsa// gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la reg byed shes rab las// ni gnas lhag
279a3(mdo sde): mthong dga' ba 'di ni shes rab rtsa/ / rig dang rnam par krol la reg 'di shes rab las// rnam thar gsum la mngon par brtson pa shes rab rtsa// rigs gsum mngon du byed pa shes rab las
279a4(mdo sde): shes bya/ / gal te dran pa nyer gzhag sgom pa shes rab rtsa// dran med yid la byed med de ni shes rab las// sdig pa spangs te dge ba spyod pa shes rab rtsa// chos 'di rang bzhin spangs
279a5(mdo sde): pa de ni shes rab las/ / gal te rdzul 'phrul rkang pa bzhi sgom shes rab rtsa// lhun grub rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'di ni shes rab las// dad pas mos nas yid ches pa ni shes rab rtsa// chags
279a6(mdo sde): pa thams cad gang bral de ni shes rab las/ / zhum med rtag tu brtson pa de ni shes rab rtsa// lus dang yid sems rab sbyangs 'di ni shes rab las// dran dang shes bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes
279a7(mdo sde): rab rtsa/ / gnas rnams kun la mi gnas 'di ni shes rab las// rang gi ting 'dzin rtogs pa de ni shes rab rtsa// rang bzhin mnyam par bzhag la spyod 'di shes rab las// gal te
279b1(mdo sde): shes rab dbang por rab gnas shes rab rtsa/ / 'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad shes pa shes rab las// stobs lnga po dag rjes su sgom pa shes rab rtsa// bcom nas ye shes thob pa de ni shes
279b2(mdo sde): rab las/ / byang chub yan lag rjes mthun bzod pa shes rab rtsa// chos kun rjes su gang rtogs de ni shes rab las// lam gyi yan lag skye gnas grub pa shes rab rtsa// chos dang chos
279b3(mdo sde): min spong ba 'di ni shes rab las/ / sdug bsngal rang bzhin mkhas pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gal te 'gog pa mngon sum byed 'di shes rab las// drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde tshig 'dzin
279b4(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa/ / nges pa'i don la rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// thams cad thos pas mi ngoms 'di ni shes rab rtsa// don la rab tu rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// rnam par shes pa tshul
279b5(mdo sde): bzhin tshol la shes rab rtsa/ / ye shes la ni shes rab rton 'di shes rab las// gang zag gang la'ang ma zhen 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gal te chos nyid rton pa 'di ni shes rab las// 'du
279b6(mdo sde): byed mi rtag yongs su tshol ba shes rab rtsa/ / gal te gzod nas ma skyes shes pa shes rab las// 'du byed sdug bsngal mos par byed pa shes rab rtsa// chos rnams 'dus ma byas su mos
279b7(mdo sde): pa shes rab las/ / chos rnams bdag med the tshom med pa shes rab rtsa// sems can 'di dag gdod nas dag de shes rab las// mya ngan 'das la zhi bar mos pa shes rab rtsa// 'gro ba
280a1(mdo sde): shin tu mya ngan 'das 'di shes rab las/ / don gyi rjes su rtog pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// don rtog so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te chos nyid mos par byed/
280a2(mdo sde): pa shes rab rtsa// chos la so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// sgra rnams kun la skrag pa med 'di shes rab rtsa// des tshig so so yang dag rig 'di shes rab las// smag med blo yi spobs
280a3(mdo sde): pa de ni shes rab rtsa/ / spobs pa so so yang dag rig pa shes rab las// gal te sems can gnas pa'i byams de shes rab rtsa// dmigs pa med pa'i byams thob de ni shes rab las//
280a4(mdo sde): bdag dang gzhan la snying rje 'di ni shes rab rtsa// gang gis gnyis kar mi rtogs de ni shes rab las// mchog tu dga' la dga' ba thob 'di shes rab rtsa// dga' med gdung ba med pa
280a5(mdo sde): 'di ni shes rab las/ / byams dang gnod par mi byed de ni shes rab rtsa// gnyis las sems grol thob pa 'di ni shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sangs rgyas dran 'di shes rab rtsa//
280a6(mdo sde): kang tshe chos sku rjes su rtogs pa shes rab las// chos kyang rtag tu dran pa 'di ni shes rab rtsa// chos rnams 'dod chags bral bar rtogs pa shes rab las// yon tan las ni dge
280a7(mdo sde): 'dun drin te shes rab rtsa/ / de yang 'dus ma byas su rtogs pa shes rab las// blo ldan gtong ba dran pa de ni shes rab rtsa// gang phyir nyon mongs kun 'dor 'di ni shes rab las//
280b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims shin tu dag ma dran 'di shes rab tu// tshul khrims zad pa med la gnas ni shes rab las// che ba'i bdag nyid lnga dran 'di ni shes rab rtsa// dag nas dag pa dran pa 'di ni shes
280b2(mdo sde): rab las/ / gang phyir bsgribs te thos pa tshol ba shes rab rtsa// gzhan dag las ni phyis mi tshol ba shes rab las// legs par byed pa'i las byed 'di ni shes rab rtsa// las phyis
280b3(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes rab las/ / nga rgyal med cing 'dud par byed pa shes rab rtsa// ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid thob 'di shes rab las// bdag gi don la brtson 'gyur 'di ni
280b4(mdo sde): shes rab rtsa/ / sems can rnams kyi don byed 'di ni shes rab las// gal te chos kyi phung po 'dzin byed shes rab rtsa// sems can spyod pa rjes su rtogs byed shes rab las// gzhan gyi/
280b5(mdo sde): blo la yang dag thob byed shes rab rtsa// sems can theg gsum nges 'byung byed pa shes rab las// blo gros ldan pa sbyin dang snyan par smra ba ngo // don byed sems can yongs smin shes rab rtsa//
280b6(mdo sde): gal te don mthun pa yis sangs rgyas yon tan 'god// 'di ni skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi shes rab las// srid pa kun tu 'bar shes skrag pa shes rab rtsa// mi skye bzod pa thob pa de ni shes rab
280b7(mdo sde): las/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'di shes rab rtsa ba ste// dbang bskur ba yis thob de ni shes rab las// gal te byang chub shing drung 'dug pa shes rab rtsa// kun mkhyen ye shes reg pa 'di ni shes
281a1(mdo sde): rab las/ / byang chub sems 'di shes rab rtsa ba zhes kyang bya// sems ni gnas su gang byed de ni shes rab las// gang dag byang chub sems la rtag gnas mi g.yo ba// de dag
281a2(mdo sde): shes rab kyis ni rtag tu las bya byed/ / rtsa ba 'di 'dra byang chub spyod pa mchog gi sems// sangs rgyas stobs dang de bzhin so so yang dag rig/ de yi bsngags pa bskal pa bye ba mang brjod kyang //
281a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan tha mar thug par 'gyur ba med// gang dag 'das pa'i bde gshegs de bzhin da ltar byung // gang dag ma 'ongs pa dang phyogs bcu'i thub dbang po// tshad med pa la bsnyen
281a4(mdo sde): bkur tshad med byed 'dod gang / / de ni ma myos byang chub sems la dga' ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces
281a5(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kye ma ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di shin tu rnam par nges shing yi ge rnams kyis bstan pa mtha'
281a6(mdo sde): yas pa/ don gyi 'jug pa mtha' yas pa/ mi brtson pa rnams kyis 'jug pa dka' ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pas zab pa/ gnyis pa spyod pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar dka'
281a7(mdo sde): ba skye mched drug la rten pa rnams kyi mthong bar dka' ba/ theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis yid ches par dka' ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lags pa/ byang
281b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid pas che ba ma mchis pa/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid kyi slad du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa/ shin tu 'das pas
281b2(mdo sde): kun gzhi ma mchis pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rab tu shes pa/ rgyu thams cad yongs su shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba nges par 'byung ba rnams kyis 'byung ba/
281b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis thabs so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba/ mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams kyis rnam par dgrol bar bgyi ba/ tshul gcig la
281b4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bgyi ba/ sna tshogs ma mchis par spyod pa rnams la khyad par ma mchis pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pas mnyam pa
281b5(mdo sde): nyid pas mi mnyam pa ma mchis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'gog pas rab tu phye bas gnyis dang bral ba/ yi ge rnams kyis dpyad du
281b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa/ don gyis yang dag par bzhag pa/ smras rnam par rig par bgyi ba/ don dam par brjod du ma mchis pa/ kun rdzob tu brjod du ma mchis pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mthu
281b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ theg pa gsum la rnam par rtog pa/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag rab tu ston pa/ khams gsum pa las shin tu 'das pa/ rig pa gsum po dag khong du chud par
282a1(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa/ chos thams cad kyi gnas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las byung ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs
282a2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis gsal bar mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub bstan pa tshad ma
282a3(mdo sde): mchis pa 'di la mos par bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems skyed par bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di
282a4(mdo sde): nyan par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par ston par bgyid
282a5(mdo sde): pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bsod nams mang du skyed pa lags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
282a6(mdo sde): pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de dag bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas
282a7(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas/ gang gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum rgyun
282b1(mdo sde): mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di nyan tam/ mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed da/ ston tam/ gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag
282b2(mdo sde): par ston tam/ bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs
282b3(mdo sde): rgyas spyan gyis zhing gang ngas mthong ba/ / rin chen bkang ste de bzhin gshegs byin yang // 'di lta bu yi chos 'di ma thos na// de ni bsod nams chung zhes nga smra'o// gang gis dam pa'i don ldan
282b4(mdo sde): phra zab pa/ / mdo sde bzang po 'di ni thos gyur nas// kun tu 'dzin cing bzung nas klog byed pa// 'di ni de bas bsod nams mchog tu 'phags// 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyi nyer gnas shing // chos
282b5(mdo sde): kyis nges par 'byung gi zang zing min/ / de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
282b6(mdo sde): chen po de la bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyi nang nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyin/ dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bya ba//
282b7(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'di yongs su bsrung bar su spro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin gcig
283a1(mdo sde): tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i
283a2(mdo sde): dus de na'ang rgyas par bgyid par spro'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'on gyis kyang ci nas de'i dus na skye bo mang po gnas par 'gyur ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi rna bar grags par
283a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa'i sangs
283a4(mdo sde): rgyas bden pa gsungs/ / bden pa'i chos la rab tu gnas// byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag la// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos// byams pa de dag
283a5(mdo sde): rab tu gnas/ / kun la byams pa nyid kyi phyir// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// bsod nams tshogs ni phun sum tshogs// ye shes tshogs kyis byung gyur pa// tshogs rnams kun dang
283a6(mdo sde): ldan pa yis/ / mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// bdud rnams thams cad nges 'jom la// smra ba thams cad rab 'dul zhing // lta ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis
283a7(mdo sde): brlabs/ / 'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang // de bzhin lha ma yin rnams dang // lha dang dri za klu dag dang // ngas ni byin gyis brlabs par byas// sa dang de bzhin bar snang la//
283b1(mdo sde): rnams mang po gang 'khod pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// tshul 'di rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor 'di bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams ldan zhing /
283b2(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi pos brgyan gyur pa// mdo sde 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// nam mkha' gzugs can byed kyang srid// gzugs ni gzugs med byed srid kyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs ni//
283b3(mdo sde): rnam par dkrugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag rnams//
283b4(mdo sde): mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// rtsa lag dang ni bcas rnams kyis// bsrung ba bzang po bgyi bar 'tshal// mkhas pa byang chub blo gros bkyis// gang dag 'dzin par bgyid pa dag/ de dag la ni
283b5(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi nas/ / rtag par kun tu bsrung bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan mdzad
283b6(mdo sde): pa gtso/ / 'dren pa chos kyi dbang bdag lags// mgon po mdo sde mchog 'di las// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// mdzad pa gzo ba bsrung
283b7(mdo sde): bgyid cing / / 'di 'dra'i mdo dang de bzhin du// mdo sde 'dzin pa bsrung bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis
284a1(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bsam gtan gang dang tshad med dang // theg pa kun gyis 'byung ba gang // de dag don ldan zab mo yi// mdo sde 'di las nges par 'byung // bdag ni tshangs//
284a2(mdo sde): pa'i bde bor te// gang na tshul 'di 'chad par ni// mnyan pa'i slad dang de bzhin du// bsrung ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu rab dga' ldan gyis
284a3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to/ / gang zhig sangs rgyas gsungs pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// skye ba gcig gis rab gnas nas// dga' ldan rnams su gnas/
284a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur// mgon po bdag ni lha yul pa'i// phun su tshogs pa bor nas su// tshul 'di rab tu ston bgyid cing // 'dzam bu gling du gnas par spro// de nas bcom ldan
284a5(mdo sde): 'das la/ bdud kyi bu ded dpon gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// gang zhig don dang ldan pa yi// mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur ba// de dag bdud las 'di spangs pas//
284a6(mdo sde): bdud kyi dbang du mi mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag kyang ni// mdo 'di kun tu bsrung slad du// ci nas kyang ni rgyas 'gyur bar// brtson par bgyid cing 'dun par bgyid//
284a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la// bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// rnam par 'dren pa gang zhig ni// nyon mongs thams cad tshar gcod pa// 'di 'dzin mgyid pa de
284b1(mdo sde): dag la/ / bdag ni sgrib par mi bgyid do// mdo sde mchog ni 'byung ba der// bdud kyi ko skabs ma mchis so// mgon pos gsungs pa dran bgyid pa// de la bsrung ba bgyi bar 'tshal/
284b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu mtshams rab kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub ni// mdo sde 'di las rab bshad pas// gang zhig mdo rje
284b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dzin pa/ / des ni sangs rgyas kun la mchod// mgon po bdag ni mdo sde 'di// lha ni bye ba rnams la bshad// gang dag gus par nyan pa dag/ byang chub yang dag 'dzin du
284b4(mdo sde): stsal/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// mi gang byang chub rab zhugs te// dam chos yongs su bsrung
284b5(mdo sde): slad du/ / bdag kyang gtong bgyid de dag ni// gsol ba ma btab bshes gnyen lags// bdag ni dga' ldan mchis nas su// sangs rgyas kyi ni byin rlabs kyis// 'di lta bu yinado
284b6(mdo sde): sde 'di/ / shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis gsol to// ston pa las ni bdag gis
284b7(mdo sde): su/ mdo sde stong phrag mang thos kyang // bdag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu// sngon chad nam yang ma thos so// mngon sum du ni mdo sde 'di// blangs shing kun tu gzung lags te// byang chub
285a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i ched du ni/ / shin tu rgyas par bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang
285a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
285a3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/ / skyes bu dam pa dag khyed la bsgo'o// khyed kyis khong du chud par bya'o// sems can gang dag theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ bzod pa
285a4(mdo sde): ma thob pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu gzung ste/ bzung nas kyang kun chub par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa/
285a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i
285a6(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su chud par 'gyur ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gzhan
285a7(mdo sde): las ma thos par rang byang chu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos yongs su zhus pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa
285b1(mdo sde): dag byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang /
285b2(mdo sde): gsal bar gyur to// me tog sil mas kyang gtor bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la
285b3(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las kyi phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis rnam par bkra bar byas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das
285b4(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rnyed par bgyi ba legs par rnyed do/ / gang gi slad du bdag cag gis rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos pas bdag cag 'dir mchis pa don mchis pa lags so// kye ma
285b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe yongs su bskyang du gsol/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
285b6(mdo sde): dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag kyang dus ring por yun ring du chos yongs su skyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad la'ang phan pa byed par gyur cig/ de nas bcom
285b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du rnam par nges pa'i chos rnam grangs 'di ni don bzang ba dang /
286a1(mdo sde): tshig 'bru bzang ba dang / legs par brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchog tu dga' ba skyed pa dang / bdud dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'jom pa dang
286a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad la mkhas pa 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam sa tshim par bgyid pa dang / theg pa thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i phyir 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
286a3(mdo sde): kyi yon tan la 'jug pa'i rjes su song ba dang / thams cad kyis brtson par bgyi ba la gti mug ma mchis par ston pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar
286a4(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i phyir gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi
286a5(mdo sde): rgyal po khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las don yod pa nyan pa lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig
286a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs de/
286a7(mdo sde): thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs
286b1(mdo sde): pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
286b2(mdo sde): skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa turba nir hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/
286b3(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
286b4(mdo sde): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang go/
286b5(mdo sde): cha chen po bgos pa sha stag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du
286b6(mdo sde): mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam thogs
286b7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dzin to// de nas 'khor de nyid du dka' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
287a1(mdo sde): pa g.yog dang bcas te 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te
287a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod dung de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mdzad
287a3(mdo sde): pas mtsham mam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu thams cad len pas gzhar yang chog shes sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lakra
287a4(mdo sde): so/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po mtsho gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med/ dpag tu med pa btsal bar bya ste/ byang
287a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyis gzhar yang tshim par mi bya'o/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas ci la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
287a6(mdo sde): la mchod par bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas dmigs pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa
287a7(mdo sde): nyid la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu bkrol ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
287b1(mdo sde): yongs su bzung ba la dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis tshangs
287b2(mdo sde): pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu'i nang du tshangs pa gtsug pud can la byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de/ 'jam dpal legs par bshad du gsol/
287b3(mdo sde): de la ni bdag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di'ang nyan par 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna ma mchis/ slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe mkhyud kyang ma
287b4(mdo sde): mchis/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir lekra par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / bzhi pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ngas khyod la bshad do// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
287b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu med pa bsdu ba'i phyir
287b6(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas
287b7(mdo sde): kyi chos dpag tu med pa mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o//
288a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa zag lta bu yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ slong ba rnams la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / log/
288a2(mdo sde): par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / shes rab las ma nyams pa'i sems dang / rtsom pa nyam 'og tu chud par byed pa'i sems te/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
288a3(mdo sde): kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no/ / lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mngon par 'phags pa yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mngon par
288a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa dang / thos pa mngon par 'phags pa dang / byam pa chen po mngon par 'phags pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par 'phags pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
288a5(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa/ snying po can mi phyed pa rdo rje lta bu'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa las mi phyed pa dang / mdza' ba las mi phyed pa dang
288a6(mdo sde): nan tan las mi phyed pa dang / theg pa chen po las mi byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bsnyed dka' ba yin no//
288a7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa dang / theg pa dman pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / skye bo mi bgrungs
288b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag / lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa than med pa'o// bzhi gang zhen/ 'phangs pa'i dngos po bams
288b2(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems dang / byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sems dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i sems te/ bzhi po de dag go/
288b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyin pa'i chos so// bani gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs
288b4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ko/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam rton par byed pa'o// bzhi
288b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba ste/
288b6(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos gya nom pa dam pa mchog yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang
288b7(mdo sde): gang dag de dang 'gal bar byed pa de dag nyid rab tu thar par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / ji tsam gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang / ji tsam du dbul bas 'phongs par gyur
289a1(mdo sde): kyang chos spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur na bdag gi longs spyod kyis
289a2(mdo sde): chog shes pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang / rab tu byung na 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
289a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / shog shog dang / snag tsha dang / smyug gu dang / glegs bam sbyin
289a4(mdo sde): pa dang / chos smra ba las nan tan snying po nyid dang / longs spyod pa zhes bya ba sbyin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po nyid do// bzhi gang zhe
289a5(mdo sde): na/ zos pa las nan tan snying po nyid dang / longs spyod pa rnams las gtong ba'i snying po nyid dang / lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i snying po nyid dang / srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
289a6(mdo sde): pa'i snying po nyid de/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su gtang bar mi
289a7(mdo sde): bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba yongs su gtang bar
289b1(mdo sde): mi bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo// bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / dben pa la mngon par dga' ba
289b2(mdo sde): dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med
289b3(mdo sde): khang ngo / / bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / 'phel ba'i gtam gyis chos nyan pa la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / skye bo rigs mthun pa dang 'du
289b4(mdo sde): ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa'i nor dang / chos ston pa'i nor dang / sems can dbul po
289b5(mdo sde): sdud pa'i nor dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba'i nor te/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs kyi gter dang
289b6(mdo sde): sposlobs pa'i gter dang / chos kyi gter dang / longs spyod zad mi shes par yongs su sngo ba'i gter te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las rnams kyi
289b7(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung ba'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang / yul thams cad las 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa las 'byung ba dang / khams gsum thams
290a1(mdo sde): cad las 'byung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mngon par 'byung ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mngon par 'byung ba'o// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtse
290a2(mdo sde): pa'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / yul spangs pas dben pa'i bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir zhi
290a3(mdo sde): ba'i bde ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga'
290a4(mdo sde): ba'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga' ba dang / chos thos pas mchog tu dka' ba dang / sbyin pa la 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sems can thams
290a5(mdo sde): cad la bde ba skyed pas mchog tu dga' ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i mu bzhi 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / yi dam
290a6(mdo sde): las mi nyams pa dang / skyabs su song ba dag yongs su mi gtong ba dang / ngag bsdams pas tshig thams cad bden pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
290a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos so/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang / ma bslabs pa thams cad la mi brnyas pa dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad
290b1(mdo sde): la bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang / yon tan thams cad bsgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa
290b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir shes rab rnam
290b3(mdo sde): par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos
290b4(mdo sde): kyi rkang pa dang / don gyi rkang pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad basbyangs pas 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs sogs pa'i rkang pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi
290b5(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa'i lag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang / thos pa'i lag pa dang / shes rab kyi lag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go//
290b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig go// bzhi gang zhe na/ las legs par byas pa'i phyir sha'i mig dang / mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig
290b7(mdo sde): dang / shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mig dang / chos thams cad las nges par sems pa'i phyir chos kyi mig ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
291a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang /
291a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba
291a3(mdo sde): rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang / dbul po la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bsam pa dka' ba byed pa dang / yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i
291a4(mdo sde): sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang / skye ba mi rtogs pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di
291a5(mdo sde): dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nad med pa'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ khams mnyam pas nad med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar mnyam
291a6(mdo sde): par gzhog pas nad med pa dang / chos thams cad la the tsom med pas nad med pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gis phyogs so// bzhi gang
291a7(mdo sde): zhen/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa'i phyogs dang / sdig pa'i thams cad mi bya ba'i phyogs dang / bzhi
291b1(mdo sde): po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi bskyod pa/ yi dam mi bskyod pa dang / ji skad smras pa de
291b2(mdo sde): bzhin du byed pa las mi bskyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs so// bzhi gang zhe na// zhi gnas
291b3(mdo sde): kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi tshogs te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du
291b4(mdo sde): 'brel bar 'gyur ba'o/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel ba dang / gtong ba dang sngo ba zung du 'brel pa dang / byams pa dang snying rje zung du 'brel pa dang / thabs dang shes
291b5(mdo sde): rab zung du 'brel ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ khron pa rdul can mthong zhing
291b6(mdo sde): de'i gting na'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / mtshe'u dang / rdzing bu 'am/ khron pa rnyog pa can mthong zhing de'i gting na yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la sprin chen
291b7(mdo sde): pos yog cing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la rlung dang / rdul dang / du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
292a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yang sa chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong pa
292a2(mdo sde): dang lam mtho dman can du mthong ba dang / bdag lam srang dog par zhugs par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu
292a3(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang / gcan gzan gtum po phal po/
292a4(mdo sde): che'i sgra thos pa dang / bdag g.yon can gyi nang na gnas par mthong ba dang / bdag gi lus dri ma can dang / gos dri ma can du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub/
292a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba mthong ba dang / rdzing bu me tog pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su gang ba
292a6(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / bdag gos dkar po'i thugs rnyed par mthong ba dang / lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsug nas gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
292a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang po sa brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang / nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po thal kar gyi khyu skad
292b1(mdo sde): 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad
292b2(mdo sde): par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ko/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi gang zhe na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char
292b3(mdo sde): papar mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / me tog pad+ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang
292b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i rmi lam mo// bzhi
292b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ shing sA la chen po'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang /
292b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud
292b7(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ gyad chen pos kyang thams cad mnan nas/ ba dan thogs te 'gro bar mthong ba dang / dpa' bo chen po g.yul las 'das te 'gro ba mthong
293a1(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / bdag nyid byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni
293a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ mgo la thod dkar pos bcings par mthong ba dang / bdag gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin
293a3(mdo sde): byed par mthong ba dang / bdag chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go// lha'i bu
293a4(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ bum pa mthong ba dang / bya tsa shas bskor bar mthong ba dang / gang dang
293a5(mdo sde): gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad dang ldan zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen po mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems
293a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan dga' mgu
293a7(mdo sde): yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag dang / ut+pal dang /
293b1(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor ro// me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la me tog pad+ma
293b2(mdo sde): shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi tshad blta na sdug pa/ bsu nga dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to// me tog de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa' lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
293b3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di
293b4(mdo sde): dag gang nas lhags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu me tog 'di dag ga las 'ongs pa nyid nas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa ste/ bdag gis khyod la
293b5(mdo sde): mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du gtor to/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du blta'o//
293b6(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshog
293b7(mdo sde): kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo // de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
294a1(mdo sde): med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas/ steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste/ gzi brjid kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas slar
294a2(mdo sde): log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga
294a3(mdo sde): sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ gser bzang dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid
294a4(mdo sde): ldan/ da skyes chen mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'// yon tan khrag khrig yon tan gzhal yas gzi brjid can// mgon po ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad// sgra snyan 'byin
294a5(mdo sde): par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'brel ba/ / tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshigs gsung ba// nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros ldan// ka la bing+ka'i gsung can ci slad
294a6(mdo sde): 'dzum pa gsungs/ / mi mchog skyes su dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can 'atul// bdud kyi stobs ni rtag par mtha' mar 'byin par mdzad// lha dang lha mi nam mkha' lding gis rtag mchod pa// stobs
294a7(mdo sde): bcu ldan pas ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ / dri med dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa// bla banya ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zhal rgyas pa// mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i dul gyi nyes gcod pa// bde dang bde
294b1(mdo sde): ldan sbyin par mdzad pa 'dzum don gsungs/ / bde bar gshegs pas dang lha lha yul phan pa mchog/ bde dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa// mtshungs shing 'brel la legs gsungs
294b2(mdo sde): gsal ba'i gsung ldan pa/ / 'dzum bstan 'di yi don ni ji ltar rtogs par bgyi// ling tog stug po mun pa rab rib rnams bsal ba// shes rab sgron ma 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan pa'o// glang chen
294b3(mdo sde): khyu mchog stabs dang seng ge'i stabs ltar brjid 'gro ba'i/ / don 'dzum dam pa'i don ni bstan du gsol// mi yi dam pa mya ngan tshogs chen 'dul mdzad pa// zab cing mthong bar dka' la gting
294b4(mdo sde): tshod dpag dka' ba/ / srid pa'i chu ni skems mdzad mnyam pa med pa can// rgyu med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci slad bstan// rga shi zhi bar bgyi ba bdud rtsi'i don stsol ba// zhabs ni
294b5(mdo sde): bajam zhing dra ba dag dang 'khor lo ldan/ / blun pa sbyong mdzad srid pa gsum na mnyam med pa// ye shes chen po mnga' bas 'dzum don bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
294b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/
294b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon
295a1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa'i drung du chos mnyan pa dang / bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lhags so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni 'jam
295a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/ / yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa
295a3(mdo sde): tephyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ming sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus
295a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni grangs rtogs par rngo mi thogs na ji snyed cig ni mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
295a5(mdo sde): busu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
295a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gcig gis bgrang bar spro'i/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni
295a7(mdo sde): lo brgyar yang bgrang bar spro ba ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rdul za rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang rdul za rab de
295b1(mdo sde): dag bzang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de tsam du tshad med
295b2(mdo sde): do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
295b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu kha rog 'dug de skad ma smra zhig/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo // shA ri'i bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na gal te
295b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ nyi ma re re thams cad la'ang chos bshad pa ka d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing / chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang
295b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par gyur la/ gang gis shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das na byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar bzhag kyang
295b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal pas gzigs par 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
295b7(mdo sde): de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis stong pa lta ci smos/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
296a1(mdo sde): 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che ba/ de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ bdag cag
296a2(mdo sde): gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes smras so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag par snang de las babs nas
296a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la/ lha'i bu dpal bzangs ldan
296a4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub
296a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs
296a6(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa lnga'o/ / sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su skul ba dang / tshod la skul ba dang / ran par skul ba dang / dbang po la skul
296a7(mdo sde): ba dang / brtan par skul ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la skul ba dang / thabs la skul ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba dang / byams pa chen po la skul ba dang / snying rje chen po la
296b1(mdo sde): skul ba dang / theg pa chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa dman pa la skul ba dang / bden pa la skul ba dang / de bya ba la skul ba dang / chos bsrung bar skul ba dang / thos pa bstan par bskul
296b2(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can sna tshogs su mi 'bye bar skul ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang / bdud kyi las bstan par skul
296b3(mdo sde): ba dang / dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar skul ba dang / bdud 'dul bar skul ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa gzo bar skul ba
296b4(mdo sde): dang / rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par skul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar skul ba dang / sems can thams
